name: Inchworm
setup: Stand tall with feet hip-width apart
steps: Hinge at hips and place hands on floor in front of feet
Walk hands forward until you're in a high plank position
Hold plank briefly, engaging core and glutes
Walk feet forward toward hands, keeping legs as straight as possible
cues: Stretch hamstrings as you walk feet forward
mistakes: Bending knees excessively when walking feet forward
safety: If hamstrings are tight, bend knees slightly when reaching for floor. Avoid if you have shoulder or wrist pain.

regressions: Walk hands only halfway to plank
Perform on elevated surface (hands on box)
progressions: Add push-up at bottom of plank
Add shoulder taps in plank position

prescriptionHints.notes: Excellent full-body warmup combining hamstring stretch, core activation, and shoulder mobility.

joints.notes: Move slowly to avoid straining hamstrings. Keep core engaged to protect lower back.
